trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER1SUB3_00574_SUEREND_100_001<tab>I imagine you were quite concerned for the future of the Bellows, what with the forge being manned by these dullards. But you need not fear, now that Sue-Rend is here!
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER1SUB3_00574_SUEREND_000_001<tab>Keep those tasks coming. More work, I say!
